parameters.name: LogType
parameters.description: The type of access log. Set the value to **layer7**, which specifies Layer 7 access logs.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Maximum value: **50**. Default value: **10**.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the CLB instance.

You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~27584~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description:
The tags that are added to the CLB instance. The tags must be key-value pairs that are contained in a JSON dictionary.

You can specify up to 10 tags in each call.
